articles.title: ED Visit Nothing To Do With Manappuram Finance, CEO Says - BQ Prime
articles.description: The ED has frozen assets of Manappuram Finance CEO VP Nandakumar after conducting raids as part of a money laundering investigation.
articles.content: Kerala-based NBFC Manappuram Finance Ltd, whose assets worth Rs 143 crore were frozen by the Enforcement Directorate recently, has claimed that the 'visit' of the agency was based on a 'malafide FIR'… [+1720 chars]

articles.title: Non-life insurance industry grows over 16% driven by health and motor insurance | Mint - Mint
